alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Telfair, Wheeler and western Montgomery Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Snipesville, or 11 miles southwest of Hazlehurst, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Helena, Lumber City, Glenwood, Ailey, Scotland, Jacksonville, Towns, Spring Hill, Landsburg, Little Ocmulgee State Park, Jordan and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
